
Epoch 16/30
100000/100000 [==============================] - 459s - loss: 1.3975     
Epoch 17/30
100000/100000 [==============================] - 459s - loss: 1.3675     
Epoch 18/30
100000/100000 [==============================] - 463s - loss: 1.3384     
Epoch 19/30
100000/100000 [==============================] - 457s - loss: 1.3092     
Epoch 20/30
100000/100000 [==============================] - 460s - loss: 1.2791     
Epoch 21/30
100000/100000 [==============================] - 463s - loss: 1.2510     
