
Epoch 22/30
100000/100000 [==============================] - 478s - loss: 1.2221     
Epoch 23/30
100000/100000 [==============================] - 463s - loss: 1.1936     
Epoch 24/30
100000/100000 [==============================] - 469s - loss: 1.1640     
Epoch 25/30
100000/100000 [==============================] - 496s - loss: 1.1364     
Epoch 26/30
100000/100000 [==============================] - 476s - loss: 1.1087     
